Class SerialInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.PipedInputStream
        • arduino.arduinocom.SerialInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, SerialPortEventListener

    public class SerialInputStream
extends PipedInputStream
implements SerialPortEventListener
    This is an input stream for serial devices.

    Jacob Glueck
